title: Kelly Refuses To Condemn Owens: Faces backlash over Israel row; cites free speech stance
summary_full: Megyn Kelly defended her decision not to condemn Candace Owens despite public pressure over controversial online claims involving Charlie Kirk. Kelly said the demands were political and rooted in Israel-related debates. She stressed about Charlie Kirk theories and that refusing to condemn someone does not mean agreement, adding she will not speak just to satisfy critics.
